com.philips.pins.shinelib.capabilities

Interface SHNCapabilityDataStreaming

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SHNCapability

    public interface SHNCapabilityDataStreaming
extends SHNCapability
    Interface to receive a stream of SHNData objects from a peripheral. Each peripheral has its own set of data types for which it supports streaming.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  SHNCapabilityDataStreaming.SHNCapabilityDataStreamingListener
      Interface containing the callback through which received streaming events are reported.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void getSupportedDataTypes(SHNSetResultListener<SHNDataType> listener)
      Returns a set of SHNDataType for which the peripheral supports streaming.
      void setDataListener(SHNCapabilityDataStreaming.SHNCapabilityDataStreamingListener listener)
      Set callback to receive a stream of SHNData.
      void setStreamingEnabled(boolean enabled, SHNDataType dataType, SHNResultListener resultListener)
      Enable or disable the SHNData streaming.

    • Method Detail

      • getSupportedDataTypes

        void getSupportedDataTypes(SHNSetResultListener<SHNDataType> listener)
        Returns a set of SHNDataType for which the peripheral supports streaming.
        Parameters:
        listener - a callback to receive the list

      • setDataListener

        void setDataListener(SHNCapabilityDataStreaming.SHNCapabilityDataStreamingListener listener)
        Set callback to receive a stream of SHNData.

        Requires subscription to be enabled.

        Parameters:
        listener - to receive a stream of SHNData objects

      • setStreamingEnabled

        void setStreamingEnabled(boolean enabled,
                         SHNDataType dataType,
                         SHNResultListener resultListener)
        Enable or disable the SHNData streaming. Note that notifications are received via SHNCapabilityDataStreamingListener which can be set via setDataListener(SHNCapabilityDataStreamingListener).
        Parameters:
        enabled - flag to enable or disable notifications
        resultListener - callback to provide feedback about subscription result
